entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of rain showers or flurries. Low minus 4. POP 70%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 70 percent chance of rain showers early this evening then 30 percent chance of flurries this evening. Clearing near midnight. Wind southwest 40 km/h gusting to 70 becoming northwest 40 gusting to 60 early this evening then north 20 gusting to 40 late this evening. Low minus 4. Wind chill minus 7 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Saturday 1 April 2023
